lead_paragraph: The new coach Steve Lavin received a commitment from Maurice Harkless, a 6-foot-6 swingman from Queens.
snippet: The new coach Steve Lavin received a commitment from Maurice Harkless, a 6-foot-6 swingman from Queens.

headline.main: St. John’s Takes Big Step in Rebuilding Process
headline.seo: Maurice Harkless Looks to Grow With St. John’s
headline.print_headline: SPORTS BRIEFING | COLLEGE BASKETBALL; Top Recruit Picks St. John’s
